institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 28 (subsidy application and payment)
contents: Article 28 (Subsidy application and payment) ① The head of the affiliated organization may pay the support fund to the supporting company by dividing it into a pre-subsidy and a post-subsidy. ② The supporting company must submit an application for subsidy payment at the time of application for pre- or post-subsidy payment as determined by the chairman of the board. It must be submitted to the head of the affiliated institution., ③ When the head of the affiliated institution receives an application for subsidy payment, he/she must check whether the support requirements, such as execution standards, are met and pay the subsidy.
